CustomField.description: Formula field to group the Reference Region and Reference Market for compact layout
CustomField.formula: IF(RICSC_ReferenceRegion__c = RICSC_ReferenceMarket__c , RICSC_ReferenceMarket__c , IF(RICSC_ReferenceRegion__c ='', '- / '+ RICSC_ReferenceMarket__c, IF(RICSC_ReferenceMarket__c ='', RICSC_ReferenceRegion__c + ' / -', RICSC_ReferenceRegion__c + ' / ' +RICSC_ReferenceMarket__c ) ))
CustomField.label: Reference Region / Market
